碩.definition: (bound form) large; big; (bound form) master's degree (abbr. for 碩士|硕士[shuo4shi4])

碩士.definition: master's degree; person who has a master's degree; learned person

碩果.definition: major achievement; great work; triumphant success

碩果僅存.definition: only remaining of the great (idiom); one of the few greats extant

碩果累累.definition: heavily laden with fruit; fertile (of trees); many noteworthy achievements
